New Records: Klay Thompson broke the previous record for threes in a Mavericks debut with six three-pointers in 26 minutes of action
Key Match Events: Luka Doncic's defensive effort on Tre Jones, Naji Marshall's ability to bring up the ball and set up the offense, Luka's pass to P.J. Washington for a three, Luka's pass to Klay Thompson for a three
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Jason Kidd's decision to tinker with the lineup, the need for the Mavericks to show a lock-down defense when an opposing player is hot
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks' 7-of-12 three-point shooting in the third quarter, Harrison Barnes' 70% shooting from the floor
Others: The Mavericks' first half shooting struggles, lazy plays, and garbage time issues
